subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Alex Ovechkin snapped a shot from 26 feet over the befuddled Lundqvist’s glove and into the net, and the red-hot Capitals went on to a 7-3 victory at Madison Square Garden.
snippet: Alex Ovechkin snapped a shot from 26 feet over the befuddled Lundqvist’s glove and into the net, and the red-hot Capitals went on to a 7-3 victory at Madison Square Garden.
